item.description:
Hi Everyone!!

We'll have our May meet up on Sunday, May 1st from 11am to 1pm.  First time attendees, please be sure to bring proof of updated vaccines for rabies, distemper and canine cough.   As many of you know, we have a limited number of chairs, so if you'd like to bring one with you please feel free to do so.

If you'd like to schedule a grooming for after the meet up, please let me know so I can be sure to have a groomer available.

Looking forward to seeing you all again!

Agni
item.name: May Meet Up
